p.d: Sophie sets of to meet Laure and Fabien Mengus, chef at the sumptuous Michelin-starred restaurant L'Arnsbourg, in Baerenthal. She then discovers Victor Krebs' seasonal bread, followed by a visit to La Fabrique a Bretzels with Raphaël Wurtz. The recipe: fricassee of wild mushrooms and cube of foie gras. Presented by: Sophie Menut.
